metadata.title: CVE-2015-3903 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libraries/Config.class.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.10, 4.2.xbefore 4.2.13.3, 4.3.x before 4.3.13.1, and 4.4.x before 4.4.6.1 disablesX.509 certificate verification for GitHub API calls over SSL, which allowsman-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted certificate.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
